title: Game disconnects and reconnects but others dont know it.
body: Having trouble with my connection with my WiFi and my game, i have recently gotten new WiFi but the connection with the game is horrible. every few seconds or  minutes i would dc but reconnect like nothing ever happened and with my friend on the same call as me told me it didn't say i dc-ed so i need help fixing this problem. thanks.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds to me like you're experiencing some pretty spotty connection issues, more than likely due to your use of wifi.

Are you able to try connecting via a wired connection to see if this resolves your issue?
